scripts.build: npm run build-icons && npm run build-app && npm run build-staticfix
scripts.build-staticfix: rm ./dist/sw.js || true && cp ./sw.js ./dist/sw.js && rm ./dist/favicon.ico || true && cp ./favicon.ico ./dist/favicon.ico && rm ./dist/CNAME || true && cp ./CNAME ./dist/CNAME && rm ./dist/200.html || true && cp ./dist/index.html ./dist/200.html
scripts.publish-test: npm run test && npm run build && surge -p ./dist -d stef-test.surge.sh
